original_text:
But I would speak to the Almighty,
    and I desire to argue my case with God.
korean_text: 참으로 나는 전능자에게 말씀하려 하며 하나님과 변론하려 하노라

sentences.original_text: But I would speak to the Almighty,
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 전능하신 분께 말씀드리고자 하며,

sentences.original_text: and I desire to argue my case with God.
